page.title: 16Religion
page.content: The area has residents from many countries and they have many different faiths. The two parish churches, All Saints in Monk Sherborne and St. Andrews at Sherborne St. John are Anglican. In Sherborne St. John there is a Brethren Chapel/Meeting Room. Many Roman Catholics in the area worship at St. Gabriels, a chapel within St. Bedes Roman Catholic Primary School. There are services held for different denominations at the two chapels within the Basingstoke District Hospital complex. Other faiths, which include Jews, Buddhists and Hindus, have to travel outside the area to their place of worship.
